name: phonebook_backend
description: Backend for my phonebook React app

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../FullStack_Open/part3/phonebook_frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Matias Reyes Olea
